Projects.title: Online Electricity Billing System
Projects.description: The aim of our project is to develop a system that is meant to partially computerize the work performed in the Electricity Board.

Projects.title: Library Management System
Projects.description: Developed a software system to handle the various functions of a library, such as issuing books, keeping records, and calculating fines.

Projects.title: Stock Market Prediction using R
Projects.description: Implemented a machine learning model in R to analyze and predict stock market trends using historical data.
